message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000, considering its worth. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your counteroffer, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $13,000. Would you be willing to go down to $11,500?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  How about we split the difference between our last two offers and settle at $12,250?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $12,250. Would you be willing to go down to $11,750?
